segments.text: I see the woman standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just really focused or if she’s ignoring everything on purpose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks like he’s about to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to give her a cookie, and it’s so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t slip on the wet floor—it’s getting dangerous in there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so absurd, and I can’t help but laugh a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a comedy of errors unfold right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
